texts.biography: Tapio is master of the protection rune. Tapeworm of a tribe of wizards, Tapio dedicated his youth to prove the evil that his people caused to the others. Defender of the ideal of community, his main weapon is mutual protection.
texts.name: Tapio

specialty.description: Creatures have spell resistance aura and natural magic resistance.
specialty.name: Protection Rune
specialty.tooltip: Creatures have spell resistance aura and natural magic resistance. Starts with protection from air, fire and water.
